trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for adding and editing data fields in a data-bound control, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, creates an empty field object.
An empty field object.
When overridden in a derived class, creates a new field object using the specified data field information.
Schema information that contains the structure of a data field.
A new field object.
When overridden in a derived class, creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref> field for the specified data field.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method is invoked when you click on the link to convert a data field into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> in the fields editor.
The data field.
The data-bound control that contains the data field.
The new template field.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
The default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Gets an unique ID for a control that is created when a data field is converted into a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.GetNewDataSourceName%2A> method is a helper method that can be used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method to generate unique IDs for the controls that are created when you click the link to convert a data field into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> in the fields editor.
The type of the control that will be created.
The data entry mode for the control.
A unique ID for the control.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
The data field.
The name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Gets the service object of the specified type.
The type of service object to get.
The service object of the specified type.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template markup for the specified data-bound control.
The data-bound control.
The template markup.
An object that contains the template markup for the specified data-bound control.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref> object for the specified data field.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.GetTemplateField%2A> method is a helper method that can be used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object and initialize its properties using the specified data field properties.
The data field.
The data-bound control that contains the data field.
The new template field.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the data field is enabled in the fields editor.
The data-bound control that contains the data field.
A value that indicates whether the data field is enabled in the fields editor.
Gets the service provider implementation that is used by the fields editor.
The service provider implementation, typically provided by the design host, which can be used to obtain additional design-time services.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether schema information is used to load the data fields.
`true` if schema information is used to load the data fields; otherwise, `false`.
